title: Craig Richardson tributes to Acrefair dad who was "full of fun"
title_page: Craig Richardson tributes to Acrefair dad who was "full of fun" - BBC News
maintext:
A man who was found dead at his home in Wrexham was "full of fun" and will be "missed forever", his family have said.
Craig Richardson, 37, died following an incident at his home in Acrefair , Wrexham, county, on Sunday, 23 February, North Wales Police (NWP) said.
A 30-year-old local man has been charged with murder, while a 32-year-old from Wrexham, arrested in connection with the incident, remains on bail as the investigation continues.
Paying tribute to Mr Richardson, his family said: "Craig was a loving son, dad, brother, uncle, nephew, cousin, partner and a friend to many who we all loved with all of our hearts.
